title: 'You must stay at home': Council uses drones to warn public to follow UK government coronavirus advice
description: Video shows drone telling those outdoors to 'follow government rules'
content:
Drones with speakers are being used by a council to tell people to stay indoors and follow the UK governments social distancing advice to slow the spread of coronavirus.
